data.oai_dc:dc: Brood parasitism and cooperative breeding datasets

The following are the original dataset, phylogenetic trees, and command code associated with the publication: Wells, M.T., Barker, F.K. 201X. "Big groups attract bad eggs: brood parasitism correlates with but does not cause cooperative breeding" Animal Behaviour, XX(X) pp. X-X This dataset includes the following: the full original data set, the datasettrimmed to regional or taxonomic variations, command code for BayesTraits analyses, Phylogenetic Maximum Clade Credibility (MCC) trees for full (global) analyses, as well astaxon and regional analyses, and code for reflecting and rescaling branch length artifactswhen producing the MCC trees.
